1.content: First off, are you male, or female?
1.title: Let's begin!

info.brief_description: You wake up in a strange land where everything and everyone wants to tickle-torture you!
info.description:
Opening your eyes, you quickly realize that you aren't in your bed. What's worse, looking down alerts you to the fact that you're completely naked! Can you find your way home in a strange world where all forms of life (all plants, animals, and humans) have an undying obsession with tickle-torturing your most sensitive spots, or will you be stuck here forever, a tickle-slave to all various types of life here? Spoiler alert, it's the latter!

Rules:
- You start out completely nude, and are not allowed to ever wear any clothing.
- Every single lifeform, including all humans, all animals, and all plants, are completely obsessed with tickle-torturing you.
- There is no way to escape, and you are stuck here forever.
